statements: SELECT * FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, hourly_rate FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE schedule_hours > 20;
SELECT * FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE hourly_rate < 50 ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_email, instructor_phone FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE hourly_rate BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE schedule_hours >= 15 ORDER BY hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY instructor_name DESC
SELECT instructor_name, hourly_rate FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE schedule_hours > 20 AND instructor_email LIKE '%gmail%'
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, instructor_phone FROM PilatesInstructors ORDER BY hourly_rate ASC, schedule_hours DESC
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_email FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE hourly_rate > 50
SELECT * FROM PilatesInstructors WHERE schedule_hours < 10 OR hourly_rate > 30 ORDER BY instructor_phone ASC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE start_time > '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM PayrollInformation WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY payroll_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, hours_worked, pay_date FROM PayrollInformation WHERE hours_worked >= 40;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT employee_id, start_time FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM PayrollInformation WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, salary, hours_worked FROM PayrollInformation WHERE pay_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT name, email FROM instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, hire_date FROM instructors WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE instructor_id = 2 ORDER BY date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT instructor_id, amount FROM payroll WHERE payment_date = '2022-05-15' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE start_time < end_time;
SELECT p.payroll_id, p.amount, i.name FROM payroll p INNER JOIN instructors i ON p.instructor_id = i.id;
SELECT s.schedule_id, i.name, s.date FROM schedule s INNER JOIN instructors i ON s.instructor_id = i.id ORDER BY s.date;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, email FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT employee_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Employees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payroll WHERE salary > 5000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, email FROM Employees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT phone_number FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Payroll WHERE salary > 5000;
SELECT e.name, a.attendance_status FROM Employees e JOIN Attendance a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT name, email FROM Instructors WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM Classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT attendance_id, attendance_date FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Instructors ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT class_name, schedule_time, capacity FROM Classes JOIN Class_Schedule ON Classes.class_id = Class_Schedule.class_id WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY class_name ASC;

SELECT Students.name AS student_name, Classes.class_name, Attendance.attendance_date FROM Attendance JOIN Students ON Attendance.student_id = Students.student_id JOIN Class_Schedule ON Attendance.schedule_id = Class_Schedule.schedule_id JOIN Classes ON Class_Schedule.class_id = Classes.class_id;

SELECT DISTINCT Instructors.name AS instructor, Classes.class_name, Attendance.attendance_date FROM Attendance JOIN Class_Schedule ON Attendance.schedule_id = Class_Schedule.schedule_id JOIN Classes ON Class_Schedule.class_id = Classes.class_id JOIN Instructors ON Classes.instructor_id = Instructors.instructor_id WHERE Attendance.attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
